category.name: PSM
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOM_enable_mem_mgt_structure_size_percent
preference.preference_description: Defines percentage of current BOM structure size which is used to calculate memory size affected to BOM memory management. This preference is considered only if BOM_enable_mem_mgt_probability_percent has value greater than 0. This preference is used only in Structure Indexing. Valid Values: integer values from 0 (BOM memory management disabled) to 100. Recommended value is 15.
